Question: Deep-In-Sight Co., Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Deep-In-Sight Co., Ltd.

Product: DIMENVUE AI-based Portable 3D Floor Plan Scanner

- Lightweight, portable device with ultra-precise LiDAR sensor and high-capacity lithium-ion battery
- Uses AI deep learning to label and segment objects in 2D RGB images
- Provides various spatial information in real-time by combining objects in the image with 3D information
- Easy to carry and suitable for construction industry floor plans
- Also showcases three new products: "CAMOSYS" - in-cabin monitoring solution, "ROUNVUE" - 3D surround view monitoring solution, and "VOMASYS" - volume measurement solution
- Working with leading OEM companies for mass production
- Aim to establish partnerships with global customers at CES 2024

Source: www.koreatechdesk.com
Summary_cn:
深睿科技有限公司。

产品：DIMENVUE基于人工智能的便携式3D楼层平面扫描仪

- 轻巧、便携的设备，配置超精确的激光雷达传感器和高容量锂离子电池
- 使用人工智能深度学习技术，在2D RGB图像上标注和分割物体
- 通过将图像中的物体与3D信息相结合，提供各种实时空间信息
- 方便携带，适用于建筑行业的楼层平面图
- 同时展示三款新产品：“CAMOSYS”-车内监控解决方案、“ROUNVUE”-3D环视监控解决方案和“VOMASYS”-容量测量解决方案
- 正与领先的原始设备制造商合作进行大规模生产
- 目标是在2024年国际消费电子展上与全球客户建立合作关系

来源：www.koreatechdesk.com
